name: 3D Survivors
description:
Mow Down All Enemies
"3D Survivors" is a flashy and vibrant casual game.
Take down the approaching monsters from all directions with high firepower.
Be cautious of the monsters coming from behind as well.

    Survive Until the End
The monsters gradually become stronger.
Obtain various power-up items to prepare for the final boss.

    Aim for the High Score
Utilize character-specific skills and systems to aim for a high score.
Use the acquired score to upgrade the characters.
